Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("No mouse") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Cannon = Tool.Handle
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Tool.Enabled = true
rocket = Instance.new("Part") rocket.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 0.5) rocket.Transparency = 0.4 rocket.Shape = "Ball" rocket.FormFactor = 3 rocket.Name ="HC"
local rocketMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") rocketMesh.MeshType = "FileMesh" rocketMesh.Name = "Mesh" rocketMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=48423624" rocketMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=48598142" rocketMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.005, 0.005, 0.005) rocketMesh.Parent = rocket
local newBV = Instance.new("BodyVelocity") newBV.P = 1000 newBV.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBV.P, newBV.P, newBV.P) newBV.Name = "BV"
local newBT = Instance.new("BodyThrust") newBT.Name = "BT"
local newBF = Instance.new("BodyPosition") newBF.P = 10000 newBF.maxForce = Vector3.new(newBF.P, newBF.P, newBF.P) newBF.Name = "BF"
local fireSound local boom
local rocketClone = {}
local damage = 15
local chargeCannon
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local adornmentPart = Instance.new("Part") adornmentPart.FormFactor = 3 adornmentPart.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 8) adornmentPart.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright green") adornmentPart.Name = "Ray" adornmentPart.Anchored = true
while Tool:FindFirstChild("CannonPartWeld") == nil or Tool:FindFirstChild("CannonPart2Weld") == nil do wait() end
local cannonPartWeld = Tool.CannonPartWeld local cannonPart2Weld = Tool.CannonPart2Weld local cannonPart = cannonPartWeld.Part1 local cannonPart2 = cannonPart2Weld.Part1
function fireBeam(beamStart, beamEnd) local distance =(beamStart - beamEnd).magnitude if distance > 150 then distance = 150 end local laser = Instance.new("Part") laser.Name = "Bullet" laser.Anchored = true laser.CanCollide = false laser.Shape = "Block" laser.formFactor = "Custom" laser.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, distance + 0.2) laser.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic laser.Locked = true laser.TopSurface = 0 laser.BottomSurface = 0 laser.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright green") laser.CFrame = CFrame.new(beamStart, beamStart + beamEnd.unit) * CFrame.new(0, 0, -distance/2) laser.Parent = game.Workspace laser.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(laser, hit) end) debris:AddItem(laser, 0.25) end
function blow(laser, hit) local humanoid if hit and hit.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if hit.Parent.ClassName == "Hat" then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(20) humanoid.Sit = true local e = Instance.new("Explosion") e.BlastRadius = 2 e.BlastPressure = 0 e.Position = hit.Position e.Parent = game.Workspace end end end function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Parent = humanoid creatorTag.Value = player debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1) end end
function shoot(target) vCharacter = Tool.Parent if vCharacter == nil or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") == nil then return end
vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then return end
local pos1 = target - cannonPart.Position local pos2 = target - cannonPart2.Position
local f1 = cannonPart2:FindFirstChild("Fire") local f2 = cannonPart:FindFirstChild("Fire")
Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(-1.5, 0.25, -2) fireBeam(cannonPart.Position , pos1.unit * 150.0) if f2 then f2.Enabled = true end wait(0.15) if f2 then f2.Enabled = false end Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(-1.5, 0.35, -2) wait(0.35) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(-1.5, 0.25, -2) fireBeam(cannonPart2.Position , pos2.unit * 150.0) if f1 then f1.Enabled = true end wait(0.15) if f1 then f1.Enabled = false end Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(-1.5, 0.35, -2) wait(0.35) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(-1.5, 0.25, -2) fireBeam(cannonPart.Position , pos1.unit * 150.0) if f2 then f2.Enabled = true end wait(0.15) if f2 then f2.Enabled = false end Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(-1.5, 0.35, -2) wait(0.35) Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(-1.5, 0.25, -2) fireBeam(cannonPart2.Position , pos2.unit * 150.0) if f1 then f1.Enabled = true end wait(0.15) if f1 then f1.Enabled = false end Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(-1.5, 0.35, -2) end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") return end
myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myTorso == nil then print("Torso not found") return end
boom = Tool:FindFirstChild("BOOM")
target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint lookAt = (target - Cannon.Position).unit
myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 myTorso.Anchored = true
fireSound = Tool:FindFirstChild("FireSound") --shoot(lookAt) shoot(target) myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 myTorso.Anchored = false wait(4.5) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() Cannon.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=73230895" Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(-1.5, 0.35, -2, -1, 0, 0, 0, -1, 0, 0, 0, 1) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myHumanoid then ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 200 myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 200 while myHumanoid.Health < ratio * 200 do myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 200 wait() end end
if cannonPartWeld then cannonPartWeld.Parent = Tool end
if cannonPart2Weld then cannonPart2Weld.Parent = Tool end end
function onUnequipped() if fireSound then fireSound:Stop()end if boom then boom:Stop() end
Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(-1.5, -1.14999998, -0.75, -1, 0, -0, 0, 0, 1, 0, 1, -0)
if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 100 myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 100 end if myTorso then myTorso.Anchored = false end Cannon.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=73261035" end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
while Tool:FindFirstChild("ChargeCannon") == nil do wait() end chargeCannon = Tool.ChargeCannon
chargeCannon.Changed:connect(function() if chargeCannon and chargeCannon.Value == true and myHumanoid and myTorso and cannonPart and cannonPart2 then Tool.Enabled = false myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 myTorso.Anchored = true
local duration = 2.0
local p1 = adornmentPart:Clone() local p2 = adornmentPart:Clone()
p1.CFrame = CFrame.new(cannonPart.CFrame.p, myTorso.Position + myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 10.0) * CFrame.new(0, 0, -4) p2.CFrame = CFrame.new(cannonPart2.CFrame.p, myTorso.Position + myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 10.0) * CFrame.new(0, 0, -4)
p1.Parent = game.Workspace p2.Parent = game.Workspace
local chargeSphere = Instance.new("Part") chargeSphere.CanCollide = false chargeSphere.Size = Vector3.new(0.4, 0.4, 0.4) chargeSphere.Shape = "Ball" chargeSphere.Anchored = true chargeSphere.CFrame = CFrame.new(myTorso.Position + myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 8.0) --+ Vector3.new(0, -2, 0) chargeSphere.Parent = game.Workspace chargeSphere.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright green") chargeSphere.Name = "DeathStar"
while duration > 0.0 do chargeSphere.Size = chargeSphere.Size + Vector3.new(1.4, 1.4, 1.4) chargeSphere.CFrame = CFrame.new(myTorso.Position + myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 8.0) --+ Vector3.new(0, -2, 0) print("Resizing", chargeSphere.Size) duration = duration - wait(0.4) wait(0.4) end
local bf = Instance.new("BodyForce") bf.force = Vector3.new(0, chargeSphere:GetMass() * 196.1 , 0) bf.Parent = chargeSphere
chargeSphere.Anchored = false chargeSphere.Velocity = myTorso.CFrame.lookVector * 50.0
chargeSphere.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(chargeSphere, hit) end)
debris:AddItem(chargeSphere, 4.5)
if p1 then p1:Destroy() end if p2 then p2:Destroy() end
wait(0.5)
Tool.Enabled = true
myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 myTorso.Anchored = false
wait(10.0) chargeCannon.Value = false else print(chargeCannon, myHumanoid, myTorso) end end)

local Tool = script.Parent local Cannon = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local cannonWalkAnim
local chargeCannon
function charge(key) if key:lower() == "q" then chargeCannon = Tool:FindFirstChild("ChargeCannon") if chargeCannon and chargeCannon.Value == false then chargeCannon.Value = true end end end
function onEquipped(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid then cannonWalkAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.WalkAnim) if cannonWalkAnim then cannonWalkAnim:Play() end end if mouse then mouse.KeyDown:connect(charge) end end
function onUnequipped() if cannonWalkAnim then cannonWalkAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
